'''''luin''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning "blue".<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 66</ref>
==Examples==
* ''[[Ered Luin|Ered '''Luin''']]'' = "Blue Mountains"
* ''[[Blue Wizards|Ithryn '''Luin''']]'' = "Blue Wizards"<ref>{{UT|Index}}</ref>
* ''[[Mindolluin|Mindol'''luin''']]'' = "Towering-head-blue"
==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[luine]]''
